A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dreadful film. Everything you have read about what is wrong with it is true - poor writing\, inconsistent tone\, depressing story\, nothing much happens apart from some excellent cgi  explosions. The villains are a mocked all the time\, which diminishes them as a credible threat. The new characters Holdo and DJ are wasted and their behaviour is ridiculous. Leia flies through space without so much as a suit. Luke milks the mammary gland of a sea cow and drinks the liquid with relish. Did we really need to see this? And there is a whole sequence involving the rescue of space horses from on a casino planet that has no point to it whatsoever. Avoid this debacle if you enjoyed any of the first 6 Star Wars films.
